trans-unit.source: Converts a control on the Web Forms page that can be validated with a validation control to a string containing the control's ID.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en kontroll på siden for Web-skjemaer som kan valideres med en validering kontroll til en streng som inneholder kontrollens-ID.

trans-unit.source: Not all controls can be validated with a validation control.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle kontroller kan ikke valideres med en validering-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This class creates a collection of control IDs on the Web Forms page that can be associated with a validation control.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen oppretter en samling av kontrollen IDer på siden for Web-skjemaer som kan knyttes til en kontroll-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used in a designer to display a list of controls on the Web Forms page that can be associated with a validation control.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen brukes vanligvis en designer for å vise en liste over vises på siden for Web-skjemaer som kan knyttes til en kontroll-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: When creating your own validation control, you can enable the designer to display a list of controls that support validation controls.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter validering kontrollen, kan du aktivere designer for å vise en liste over kontrollene som støtter validering Kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Simply add an attribute to the string property that represents the control to validate, as follows: ```vb# <TypeConverter(GetType(ValidatedControlConverter))> _ Public Property ControlToValidate() As String Get // Add code to get the ID of the control to validate. End Get Set // Add code to set the ID of the control to validate. End Set End Property ``` ```c# [TypeConverter(typeof(ValidatedControlConverter))] public string ControlToValidate { get { // Add code to get the ID of the control to validate. } set { // Add code to set the ID of the control to validate. } } ```
trans-unit.target: Ganske enkelt å legge til et attributt strengegenskap som representerer kontrollen for å validere, som følger:```vb# <TypeConverter(GetType(ValidatedControlConverter))> _ Public Property ControlToValidate() As String Get // Add code to get the ID of the control to validate. End Get Set // Add code to set the ID of the control to validate. End Set End Property ``` ```c# [TypeConverter(typeof(ValidatedControlConverter))] public string ControlToValidate { get { // Add code to get the ID of the control to validate. } set { // Add code to set the ID of the control to validate. } } ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified control should be added to the list of controls that can be validated.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den angitte kontrollen skal legges til i listen over kontroller kan valideres.

trans-unit.source: When the FilterControl method returns `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter> instance will add the ID of the control specified in the control parameter to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden FilterControl returnerer `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter>forekomsten legger IDen for kontrollen som er angitt i parameteren kontrollen til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control should be added to the list of controls that can be validated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen skal legges til i listen over kontrollene som kan valideres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
